What is functional programming? what are those principle? Gonna talk here about the very basics of FP. The essence of programming is composition. In the OOP paradigm we are building sofware by using Object that communicates with each other. To build bigger software we compose those objects. The object is the building block

In FP the building blocks are functions! Each function operate on data. The software is made using functions and we compose them to build bigger software.
